titleInfo.title: Bluegrass Tribute to Courtney Johnson at the Ryman Auditorium

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color window card (purple and green on white) announcing a Bluegrass Tribute to Courtney Johnson featuring Sam Bush, Bela Fleck, John Cowan, Curtis Burch, Jerry Douglas, Tony Rice, Russell Smith, Vassar Clements, Nashville Bluegrass Band, Del McCoury, Jack Lawrence, Bluegrass 45, Norman and Nancy Black, John Hartford, CHesapeake, Tom O'Brien and The O'Boys, Hot Rize, Peter Rowan, Eddie Adcock Band, and others at the Ryman Auditorium on September 24. Poster features a metal photoplate of the Ryman Auditorium.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
